name: Blackmarket
tagline: blackmarket is a fan made application for the free to play MMORPG game Path of Exile
body:
Blackmarket is a Path of Exile items search tool that allows you to search what you want in easiest possible way. As easy just typing in "90life 60res gloves" in the search field and hit 'enter'. This will search for gloves with at least 90 life, at least 60 total elemental resistances, with buyout and online only, sorted cheapest first.

## Screenshot:
![screenshot-1](https://github.com/thirdy/blackmarket/blob/master/blackmarket/v0.2-pre-alpha-release-scrsht1.png)

## An important note on Open Source
Blackmarket is **100% free** and fully **open source** under GPLv2. In a nutshell, this means that this software will always be free, and anyone can take the source code and modify it for improvements. However, this will also require that all the released modified versions be free software as well.

Read more about open source [here](http://opensource.com/resources/what-open-source). The [GNU GPLv2 FAQ](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0-faq.en.html) page is also a good read.

## Download
Download latest version now from the [Releases](https://github.com/thirdy/blackmarket/releases) page.

## Requirements
You'll need to have the **Java Runtime Environment (JRE)** installed. You can download the latest version of Java [here](https://www.java.com). JRE is just like .NET Framework which is also a runtime environment, only easier to install and better :P. Blackmarket is tested with Java 8, but it should work with Java 7 as well.

## How to run
Double click the blackmarket-<version>.jar. As simple as that.

## Basic Usage
1. Type in what you wanna search, for example: 500pdps 2hsword 5L6s
2. Click _Search_ and wait for the results to show up.
3. You click on any of the items to open up the _Item View Window_.
4. Once you've decided to buy something, click _WTB_ button. This will copy a generated WTB message to your clipboard.
5. Switch to in-game, open the chat window and press CTRL+V.
6. Be friendly and happy trading!

### Note on defaults
* **League** - Set to Warbands by default
* **With Buyout Only** - Set to true by default. To disable this, set buyoutOnly=false, buyoutOnlyCurrency=<blank>
You can change this via **blackmarket.properties** file which is found in your home directory/.blackmarket. E.g. C:\Users\<YourUserName>\.blackmarket.

## Advance Usage
1. The _"Blackmarket Language"_ is designed to be customizable and extensible via _blackmarket.language_ file. The guide on editing this file has not yet materialized but here is an example:
   * `cod  = name=Cloak of Defiance`
   * `veil = name=Veil of the Night`
2. You can also customize the **look and feel** via _lookAndFeel_ and _highlightColor_ properties in blackmarket.properties file. Below is a screenshot of what I've achieved while playing around with it:

![screenshot-3](https://github.com/thirdy/blackmarket/blob/master/blackmarket/v0.2-pre-alpha-in-development.png)

## Suggestions or Issues?
Feel free to post your feedback/suggestions/bugs to the [github issue tracker](https://github.com/thirdy/blackmarket/issues).
